## Project Details
- Type: Next.js 14+ Fashion E-Commerce
- Framework: Next.js with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Purpose: Full-featured fashion e-commerce platform with AI virtual try-on

## Implementation Complete
✅ Full Next.js project structure created
✅ 50+ pages and components implemented
✅ Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
✅ Shopping cart with Zustand state management
✅ Product catalog with 20+ demo products
✅ Authentication UI (login/register)
✅ Checkout flow with payment forms
✅ AI Virtual Try-On interface
✅ User account management pages
✅ Complete README documentation
